title: He is not an Artist – Ex1

items.q: Is Mrs. Robinson in her garden?
Is Mrs. Robinson standing near the fence?
Is Mrs. Robinson talking to Mrs. Price?
Is Mrs. Robinson talking to her husband?
Is Mr. Price using the ladder now?
Is Mr. Price painting the bathroom?

title: He is not an Artist – Ex2

items.q: Is Mrs. Robinson in the kitchen or in the garden?
items.a: She is in the garden but she is not in the kitchen.

items.q: Is Mrs. Robinson talking to Mrs. Price or to her husband?
items.a: She is talking to Mrs. Price but she is not talking to her husband.

items.q: Is Mr. Price upstairs, or is he in the garden?
items.a: He is upstairs but he is not in the garden.

items.q: Is he painting a picture, or is he painting the bathroom?
items.a: He is painting the bathroom but he is not painting a picture.

title: He is not an Artist – Ex3

items.q: What are Mrs. Robinson and Mrs. Price doing?
